title: Test File Metadata
description: This file lists any test files that the user has provided, and describes what they are and how they can be used

files.description: A short WAV audio recording of a person saying "What is the capital of France? Respond with only one word.". The person stops talking, and the audio recording ends immediately afterward.

A short WAV audio recording of a person saying "What is the capital of France? Respond with only one word.". The person stops talking, and there is a period of silence lasting a few seconds following the end of the speech.
